TRANSLATION: (1) When the victory of Allāh has come and the conquest,[2005]

ARABIC_TEXT: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
TRANSLATION: (2) And you see the people entering into the religion of Allāh in multitudes,

ARABIC_TEXT: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
TRANSLATION: (3) Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.[2006]
